list.name: Default
list.comment: Renamed corkboad-message to corkboard.js. Renamed assert method to equals in clientside tests. Minor formatting changes. Added yuidocjs to dev dependencies.

task.summary: Default task

Initial commit:
- sid within cookie remains the same by every request - database access works - isAuthenticated middelware works
Working on session storage

Basic socket.io implementation:
- send data "test" - retrieving data from database

Implemented native express MemoryStore module.
Session data is now available in socket
Error Handling socket.io authorization
Error Handling socket.io authorization
A message sent from client to the socket server is saved in the according profile document. The new message is also sent to the client and gets displayed.
Implemented client side in profile.js. Added comments in app.js.
Implemented client side. Added comments in app.js. #1
Implemented client side in profile.js. Added comments in app.js. #1

Deleted session-mongoose and references in package.json
Added registration page with redirect in middleware isAuthenticated
Added registrationController and registration view according to last commit

Implemented registration
Added comment in registrationController

Implemented profile routing
Added comments in profileController.js

Implemented user view
Implemented registration routing (no registered user may request the side)
Show messages on profile view
[Bug] Get User from Database even if it's the own profile. This is because messages don't get update in sesssion.
Added "algorithm/utils/index.js" which includes functions to sort messages by date (most recent first) and to format a date
Added session.profile_error on profileController and changed the res.render function.

Added bootstrap to project.
Wrote basic css for profile.

Implemented real time chat.
Added chatController.js, chat.jade and chat.js.
Implemented Validation of message-fields in profile and chat view.

Css/HTML registration view.
.jade formatting in all files.
Working on friend request.

Added notAuthorized view.
Redirect from isAuthenticated middleware function to the view via registrationController.
Working on client side js.

Implemented friend functionality.
- send friend request - accept friend request - decline friend request

Validate registration view.
When a user goes back (using the browser's back functionality) and register again, he will be forward to his own profile page.

Pass model and utils from app.js to the index.js of controller.
Edited file paths in requires to be relative.
Structured project folders.
Changed export of the model module.
Changed routes. All routes are configured within /controller/index.js now.
Minor changes on app.js.
Minor changes on app.js (environments).
misc ...

Changed chat view css.
Fixed css bug at corkboard messages.

Implemented virtual for full_name.
Therefore schemaOption where required.
Implemented static methods for userSchema.

Changed Certificates.
Fixed Bug: Friend-Request Notification. All messages where fading out.
Renamed algorithm folder to utils.
Changed directory structure, added an app folder for controller, mode and view.
(Re-)Added "../public/img" folder to Git.

Implemented Validation in userModel. (For: first_name, last_name, email and the uniqueness of a user in database)
Implemented validation in registrationController.js resp. registration view.

Implemented registration view validation, changed userModel validation.
Validation if the user already exists in db is now performed by mongoose's duplicate key error.
Implemented userSchema's statics in socket.io implementation.
Refactored userSchemas: message.from to messages._id
Excluded socket implementation from app.js to socket.js
Implemented userSchema's statics in controller implementation.
Changed database api.

Middle ware improvements involving the default route.
Added devDependencies for tests.

Added test files to project.
Expose server in app.js.

Wrote tests for User Collection. Wrote tests for two Routes. (no certificate required routes)
Added async-module to project.
Fixed path to certificates in test.

Refactored client-side architecture.
Minor changes on the server side.
Added and implemented registration.js and Core.Ajax.js.
Minified, concatenate and gzipped javascript. Ran JSHint through project.
Added certs. Split tests.

Fixed a bug on client side javascript, regarding flash messages on corkboard messages and friend notifications.
Added jshint and yuidocjs to project.
Fixed a bug that allowed cross site scripting (XSS) by sending corkboard or chat messages.
Fixed a bug regarding the redirection on the profile view.

Renamed user.jade to users.jade.
Commenting.
Switched one event.

Added and implemented client side testing.
Implemented permissions for socket communication (proxy pattern)in sandbox.js
Minor changes on server side tests.

Check-In after long time, before the start of code formatting.
Bug fix in utils/index.js.
Code formatting and documentation. #1
